Tests that low text contrast issues are reported.
Inspector issue: {
    issue : {
        code : LowTextContrastIssue
        details : {
            lowTextContrastIssueDetails : {
                contrastRatio : 3.95
                fontSize : 16px
                fontWeight : 400
                thresholdAA : 4.5
                thresholdAAA : 7
                violatingNodeId : <integer>
                violatingNodeSelector : div.issue
            }
        }
    }
}
